mobiles.name: shelob
mobiles.long_description: Shelob is here waiting for food.
mobiles.description: Shelob has huge teeth and is looking hungraly at you.

mobiles.name: rider rohan
mobiles.long_description: A rider of Rohan is here waiting for battle
mobiles.description:
A good rider of Rohan is camped here, carefully watching the orcs, 
waiting for the attack.

mobiles.name: gandalf mage
mobiles.long_description: A mage wearing white robes is here.

mobiles.name: ent tree
mobiles.description: It looks tree like, yet strangley alive.

mobiles.name: ent tree
mobiles.description: It looks tree like, yet strangely alive.

mobiles.name: aragorn
mobiles.description: Aragorn peers at you as if searching your soul.

mobiles.name: legolas elf
mobiles.long_description: Legolas the elf stands here, proud and tall.
mobiles.description:
Legolas has keen eyes and you don't doubt that he could pin your ears back 
from a hundred yards.

mobiles.name: gimli dwarf
mobiles.long_description: Gimli the dwarf stands here brandishing his axe.
mobiles.description:
Gimli likes his axe.
Gimli's axe is VERY sharp and would have no problem seperating your head 
from your body.

mobiles.name: orc
mobiles.long_description: An elite orc of the white hand stands here.
mobiles.description:
This orc has risen through the orc ranks in the only way possible to an 
orc - maiming, hacking and slaying anything that comes in its way!

mobiles.name: saruman mage
mobiles.long_description: Saruman the mage is here, completing the casting of a powerful spell.
mobiles.description:
Saruman is an evil ambitious mage, that will and frequently does destroy 
anything that gets in his way.

mobiles.name: gollum
mobiles.description:
Gollum is a wretch.

Gollum says: where iss it precioussss?

mobiles.name: farimir prince
mobiles.long_description: Farimir the prince of Gondor stands here.
mobiles.description:
Farimir is the prince of Gondor.
One day he shall rise as king of the land, if there is any land to be 
king of....

mobiles.name: nazgul
mobiles.long_description: The Nazgul looks at you and attacks.
mobiles.description:
This is an evil ringwraith, fear of all.
Where they go, death and destruction follow.

mobiles.name: balrog
mobiles.long_description: The Balrog looks down at you and moves in for the kill.
mobiles.description:
The Balrog is HUGE.
Wielding a flaming sword and whip, it is a formidable opponent.

mobiles.name: witchking
mobiles.long_description: The Witchking stands here - time to die.
mobiles.description:
The Witchking is the most powerful of the evil Nazgul.
Be afraid.

mobiles.name: sauron mage
mobiles.long_description: Sauron the mage is here momentarily surprised by your presence.
mobiles.description: Sauron is the most powerful and evil mage that ever graced this world.

mobiles.name: nazgul
mobiles.long_description: The Nazgul looks at you and attacks.
mobiles.description:
This is an evil ringwraith, fear of all.
Where they go, death and destruction follow.

objects.name: whip flaming
objects.description: A whip lies coiled here, emitting flames.

objects.name: sword ebony
objects.description: An ebony sword lies here with intricate glowing runes.

objects.name: fish
objects.description: A fish lies here looking pathetic.

objects.name: hole
objects.description: There is a hole in the floor here.

objects.name: parchment
objects.description: A parchment lies here crumbling into dust.

objects.name: axe razor
objects.description: An axe lies here slicing the light.

objects.name: signpost
objects.description: A sign is here - maybe you should read it.

extra_descr_data.description:
One ring to rule them all.
One ring to find them.
One ring to bring them all.
And in the darkness bind them.
in the land of Mordor where the shadows lie.

objects.name: sword
objects.description: A large majestic sword lies here.

objects.name: crown
objects.description: A crown lies here radiating evil.

objects.name: sword ebony
objects.description: An ebony sword lies here with intricate glowing runes.

rooms.name: The tunnel entrance.
rooms.description:
You are standing at the entrance to a large tunnel. The walls are damp to 
the touch, and a shiver runs up your spine as you hear a scuffling sound 
from ahead. There is a sign here.

extra_descr_data.description:

บ     One ring to rule them all, one ring to find them.        บ
บ                                                              บ
บ   One ring to bring them all and in the darkness bind them.  บ
บ                                                              บ
บ       In the land of Mordor where the shadows lie.           บ
ศออออออออออออออออออออออออออออออออออออออออออออออออออออออออออออออผ

rooms.name: A dark tunnel.
rooms.description:
You are further up the tunnel, with millions of tons of rock pushing down on 
you from all sides. You hope the tunnel doesn't go on for much longer...

rooms.name: The dark tunnel.
rooms.description:
You feel as though you've been trapped in the tunnel forever, and still it 
doesn't look like ending.

rooms.name: The dark tunnel
rooms.description:
You can see a light up ahead. It could be a way out of this awful tunnel, 
or it could be something much more sinister.

rooms.name: Shelob's liar
rooms.description:
The smell is terrible, death is everywhere and the cause of this suffering 
wants to make you its next meal...

rooms.name: The plains of Mordor
rooms.description:
The relief you feel after coming out of the tunnel is shortlived as you 
take a look at your sourroundings...
you have entered the foreboding land of Mordor.

rooms.name: The plains of Mordor
rooms.description:
The plains continue to the west, while to the north you can see the start 
of a forest...

rooms.name: The plains of Mordor
rooms.description:
The land to the west becomes impossible to negotiate, forcing you to 
turn back or to the south from where sounds can be heard.

rooms.name: The camp.
rooms.description:
You are at the north end of the camp of the riders of Rohan. 
To the south is the rest of the camp, while in the distance to the east 
you can just make out the camp of the orcs.

rooms.name: The camp.
rooms.description:
You are at the south end of the camp of the riders of Rohan. 
To the south you can see the plains of Mordor, while to the east if your 
quite you might be able to sneak into the orc encampment.

rooms.name: The plains of Mordor
rooms.description:
You have left behind the anticpation of battle. 
To the south you think you can see a movement or three.....

rooms.name: The party of three.
rooms.description:
You have come across three brave adventurers trying to work there way to 
the north without encountering the orcs.

rooms.name: The orc camp.
rooms.description:
You are at the south end of the orc camp. The smell is awful as the orcs 
prepare to go to battle by drinking themselves silly and practising on small 
animals and sometimes each other.

rooms.name: The orc camp.
rooms.description:
You are at the north end of the orc camp. The smell is just as bad here as 
it was to the south.

rooms.name: The start of a forest.
rooms.description:
The trees are thickening and the light is thinning, if it keeps up like 
this, you won't be able to see soon.

rooms.name: The forest.
rooms.description:
You are deep in the forest. 
Trees surround you, and all light is blocked by the overhanging canopy. 
Strangely though an eerie light is being emitted from somewhere.

rooms.name: The forest.
rooms.description:
You are in thick forest, but while it should be dark as hell, there seems 
to be a light coming from an old man standing by a tree. 
He seems to be trying to start up a conversation with it!

rooms.name: The forest
rooms.description:
You are in thick forest. Still a strange light seems to be coming from 
somewhere.  On the edge of your vision your sure you keep seeing movements,
but when you look around, there are only trees there.

rooms.name: The forest
rooms.description:
You are in thick forest.  To the west you can see what looks like a glowing
old man, while to north you can see a very old looking tree that seems to
have a presence of its own...

rooms.name: The forest.
rooms.description:
You have reached a small clearing in the forest. At the edge of the clearing
is a very old looking tree which you are sure keeps moving.

rooms.name: The forest.
rooms.description:
You are in the forest. To the north you can see movements.
Maybe you should turn back....

rooms.name: A large clearing
rooms.description:
You have reached what should be a large clearing, but maybe the word 
"clearing" is along the wrong lines as there are trees everywhere!

rooms.name: The forest
rooms.description:
The trees are thinning out once again and you've passed through the forest.
But looking ahead you wonder if perhaps you might be safer in there.

rooms.name: A path
rooms.description: You are on a path leading to the north where you can see a large tower.

rooms.name: Before the tower.
rooms.description:
You are standing before a large, evil looking tower.
As you look towards the top of the tower, you get a very unpleasant feeling
about what lives up there.

rooms.name: The base of Sarumans tower.
rooms.description:
You've managed to get into Sarumans tower.
Now you'll have to try and get out....alive.

rooms.name: Sarumans work room.
rooms.description:
There are potions and bubbling liquids everywhere.
You think it might be a good idea not to touch anything.

rooms.name: The plains.
rooms.description: The plains continue to the east where you can see a T-junction.

rooms.name: The plains.
rooms.description:
You at a T-junction. To the south you can see a lake, while to the north
the land seems to become darker if thats possible.

rooms.name: Near a lake.
rooms.description:
You are approaching a dark lake. You find it hard to imagine what sort
of vile creature would live in those waters.

rooms.name: Nearer a lake.
rooms.description:
As you get nearer the lake, you notice that it has a sickly sweet smell.
You shudder as you realise it is the smell of death.

rooms.name: By a lake.
rooms.description:
You are at the shores of the lake. It is impossible to continue further
in this direction. The waters of the lake smell worse close up.

rooms.name: The dark land of Mordor.
rooms.description:
Its so dark here or maybe its just your imagination.
Even the sun seems darker.

rooms.name: The dark land of Mordor.
rooms.description:
Its so dark here or maybe its just your imagination.
Even the sun seems darker.

rooms.name: Dead end.
rooms.description:
You have reached a dead end. It is impossible to continue further this way.
Or is it?

rooms.name: The dark land of Mordor.
rooms.description:
Its so dark here or maybe its just your imagination.
Even the sun seems darker.

rooms.name: The dark land of Mordor.
rooms.description:
Its so dark here or maybe its just your imagination.
Even the sun seems darker.

rooms.description:

Even the sun seems darker.

rooms.description:

Even the sun seems darker.

Even the sun seems darker.

Even the sun seems darker.

Or is it?

Even the sun seems darker.

rooms.name: The long trail.
rooms.description: The land is dark and the trail seems to go on forever.

rooms.name: The long trail.
rooms.description: The land is dark and the trail seems to go on forever.

rooms.name: The long trail.
rooms.description: The land is dark and the trail seems to go on forever.

rooms.name: The end of the trail.
rooms.description:
You have reached the end of the trail. To the north you can see the ominous
tower of Sauron.

rooms.name: The long trail.
rooms.description: The land is dark and the trail seems to go on forever.

rooms.name: The long trail.
rooms.description: The land is dark and the trail seems to go on forever.

rooms.name: The entrance to Saurons tower.
rooms.description:
You are at the entrance to Saurons tower. Strangely the doors are open, as 
if Sauron knows no one would dare to enter his abode.

rooms.name: The hideout cave.
rooms.description:
You have found a secret cave used by the men of Gondor to rest in when
on scouting missions in Mordor.

rooms.name: The first floor.
rooms.description:
You are on the first floor of Saurons tower. It is deadly silient
except for your breathing.

rooms.name: The first floor.
rooms.description:
You are on the first floor of Saurons tower. It is deadly silient
except for your breathing.

rooms.name: The first floor.
rooms.description:
You are on the first floor of Saurons tower. It is deadly silient
except for your breathing.

You are on the first floor of Saurons tower. It is deadly silient
except for your breathing.

You are on the first floor of Saurons tower. It is deadly silient
except for your breathing.

You are on the first floor of Saurons tower. It is deadly silient
except for your breathing.

You are on the first floor of Saurons tower. It is deadly silient
except for your breathing.

You are on the first floor of Saurons tower. It is deadly silient
except for your breathing.

rooms.name: The first floor.
rooms.description:
You are on the first floor of Saurons tower. It is deadly silient
except for your breathing.

rooms.name: The first floor.
rooms.description:
You are on the first floor of Saurons tower. It is deadly silient
except for your breathing.

rooms.name: The second floor.
rooms.description:
You have reached the second floor of Saurons tower. It seems a little 
warmer here.

rooms.name: The second floor.
rooms.description:
You have reached the second floor of Saurons tower. It seems a little 
warmer here.

rooms.name: The second floor.
rooms.description:
You have reached the second floor of Saurons tower. It seems a little 
warmer here.

rooms.name: The second floor.
rooms.description:
You have reached the second floor of Saurons tower. It seems a little 
warmer here.

rooms.name: The third floor.
rooms.description:
You have made it to the third floor. The silence is more obvious here
and it is definetly getting warmer.

rooms.name: The third floor.
rooms.description:
You have made it to the third floor. The silence is more obvious here
and it is definetly getting warmer.

rooms.name: The third floor.
rooms.description:
You have made it to the third floor. The silence is more obvious here
and it is definetly getting warmer.

rooms.name: The third floor.
rooms.description:
You have made it to the third floor. The silence is more obvious here
and it is definetly getting warmer.

rooms.name: The fourth floor.
rooms.description:
You are on the fourth floor. The heat is becoming unbearable as is the
silence that hangs over this place like a cloak.

rooms.name: The fourth floor.
rooms.description:
You are on the fourth floor. The heat is becoming unbearable as is the
silence that hangs over this place like a cloak.

rooms.name: The fourth floor.
rooms.description:
You are on the fourth floor. The heat is becoming unbearable as is the
silence that hangs over this place like a cloak.

rooms.name: The fourth floor.
rooms.description:
You are on the fourth floor. The heat is becoming unbearable as is the
silence that hangs over this place like a cloak.

rooms.name: The fifth floor.
rooms.description:
You have reached the fifth floor. While the heat continues to rise, the 
silence is broken by an ominous scratching and the sound of something
very big breathing....somehow you prefered the silence.

rooms.name: The fifth floor.
rooms.description:
You have reached the fifth floor. While the heat continues to rise, the 
silence is broken by an ominous scratching and the sound of something
very big breathing....somehow you prefered the silence.

rooms.name: The fifth floor.
rooms.description:
You have reached the fifth floor. While the heat continues to rise, the 
silence is broken by an ominous scratching and the sound of something
very big breathing....somehow you prefered the silence.

rooms.name: The fifth floor.
rooms.description:
You have reached the fifth floor. While the heat continues to rise, the 
silence is broken by an ominous scratching and the sound of something
very big breathing....somehow you prefered the silence.

rooms.name: The top floor.
rooms.description:
You have reached the top of Saurons tower. The tempreture here is so
unbearable. You don't know how long you can stand it.

rooms.name: The top floor.
rooms.description:
You have reached the top of Saurons tower. The tempreture here is so
unbearable. You don't know how long you can stand it.

rooms.name: The antechamber.
rooms.description:
You are in the antechamber which leads to Saurons chamber. If you can
get past the eight foot tall creature blocking the way....

rooms.name: Sauron's room.
rooms.description:
You have reached Sauron!
Now what?  Surely its time to die.
